com.ibm.team.repository.client
Interface ISharedItemChangeEvent

All Superinterfaces:
IEvent
public interface ISharedItemChangeEvent
extends IEvent

Represents an event describing a change to a shared item.

Since:
0.5

Field Summary

          Event type constant.

Field Detail

SHARED_ITEM_CHANGE_EVENT_TYPE

static final java.lang.String SHARED_ITEM_CHANGE_EVENT_TYPE
Event type constant. This constant can be passed as a category to the addGenericListener and removeGenericListener methods of IEventSource

See Also:
IEvent.getEventType(), IEventSource.addGenericListener(Object, IListener), IEventSource.removeGenericListener(Object, IListener), Constant Field Values
Method Detail

getItemManager

IItemManager getItemManager()
Returns the item manager that generated this event.

Note that this method is equivalent to (IItemManager) getEventSource() ).

Returns:
the item manager; never null

getSharedItem

IItem getSharedItem()
Returns the shared item affected by this event. The item type is either simple or auditable.

Note that by the time this event is being reacted to, the shared item might have changed further. If the stated id of the shared item and the after state are different, there are further events to come.

Returns:
the possibly-partial shared item; never null

getBeforeState

IItem getBeforeState()
Returns the item state of the item before the event occurred. Returns null when the event describes a shared item being added to the item manager, either because a new item is being created in the repository or because an item in the repository is becoming known to the item manager.

Note that by the time this event is being reacted to, the shared item might have changed further. The before state accurately reflects what was known about the item immediately before this event.

Returns:
the possibly-partial before state of the item, or null if the shared item is being added; if non-null, the state has the same item type and item id as sharedItem

getAfterState

IItem getAfterState()
Returns the item state of the item after the event occurred. Returns null when the event describes a shared item being removed from the item manager because the item was deleted in the repository. No event is generated when the shared item drops out of sight from the item manager.

Note that by the time this event is being reacted to, the shared item might have changed further. The after state accurately reflects what was known about the item immediately after this event.

Returns:
the possibly-partial after state of the item, or null if the item is being deleted; if non-null, the state has the same item type and item id as sharedItem
